Description: Body sherd of Chian Mature Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: glazed streaky black, with two faded added white bands; exterior: painted decoration consisting of part of griffin’s head, to right; vertical band to right.
Curator's comments: For other griffins on Chian pottery, see British Museum 1965,0930.279.
Bibliographic references: Lemos 1991 / Archaic Pottery of Chios. The Decorated Styles (p. 256, no. 456, pl. 61)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0532) (phase 2)
